attributes.action: Help reduce the cost of living in the country.
attributes.background: To spread the word that there are organisations that help people being affected by the cost of living crisis on the next parliament meeting that will be broadcasted to the entire country because a lot of people are being affected buy the cost of living in the UK but don't know who to turn to.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. We understand that you're concerned about the cost of living, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

The Government already publishes information about cost of living support, which you can find here: https://www.gov.uk/cost-of-living
